level.text: Any survivor of domestic violence may use such domestic violence as a defense to his or her failure to report under this subchapter.
For the purposes of this section, the term "domestic violence" means intimate partner violence, as defined in § 16-1001(7), and intrafamily violence, as defined in § 16-1001(9).

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-315 added this section.
